title: Soft Carbon in Non-aqueous Rechargeable Batteries: A Review of its Synthesis, Carbonization mechanism, Characterization, and Multifarious applications.
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00174E, Review Article

Shuvajit Ghosh, Mohammad Zaid, Jyotirekha Dutta, Monira Parvin, Surendra K Martha
Soft carbon is a special class of carbon material having tunable physical properties that make it suitable for various battery applications. The precursors containing large polyaromatic hydrocarbons undergo mesophase formation...
